title: Cyclone Asani Puts Rescuers, Army On Alert In Andamans: 10 Points - NDTV
content:
1. Cyclone Asani Puts Rescuers, Army On Alert In Andamans: 10 Points  NDTV
  2. Cyclone Asani to intensify into a deep depression; IMD warns as strong winds, rain lash Andamans  Hindustan Times
  3. Cyclone Asani: Storm likely to impact Andaman Islands, Bangladesh and Myanmar  India Today
  4. Cyclone Asani Puts Rescuers, Army On Alert In Andamans  NDTV
  5. Cyclone Asani: IMD issues warning as parts of Andaman experience rain, strong winds | WATCH  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Andaman and Nicobar Islands administration has made plans to evacuate residents from low-lying areas and the Army has also put its ships and relief teams on standby as the archipelago experienced heavy rain and strong winds due to Cyclone Asani.
